comment.text: The "LiveChatOff" translation key is used to display a success message when a live chat widget is successfully hidden or disconnected. This message appears after clicking on a support button, indicating that the chat has been removed from view.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Canlı söhbət uğurla kəsildi" is technically correct but sounds somewhat awkward in Azerbaijani. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the action of disabling/turning off the live chat.

The translation "Чата на живо е успешно преустановен" uses 'преустановен' which implies a more formal or complete termination. 'Disconnected' in this context likely refers to a temporary disconnection. A better translation would reflect that.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Чата на живо е успешно прекъснат

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Live chat is met succes verbroken' is not the most natural way to say 'Live chat was successfully disconnected' in Dutch. 'Is' (is) implies a current state, while the English suggests a completed action.
While not strictly incorrect, using 'losgekoppeld' is more idiomatic for 'disconnected' in a technical context.

The translation 'Czat na żywo został zakończony' isn't the most natural or accurate translation of 'Live chat was successfully disconnected'. While 'zakończony' can mean ended, 'disconnected' implies a more technical action. A better translation would convey that.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Czat na żywo został pomyślnie odłączony

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "සජීව සංවාදයෙන් විසන්ධි විය" while literally meaning 'Disconnected from live conversation' doesn't fully convey the meaning of 'Live chat was successfully disconnected'. It lacks the 'successfully' aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Possible alternative: "සජීව සංවාදය සාර්ථකව විසන්ධි විය" (Sajeeva sanvaadaya saaththaka wa disaandhi viya) - meaning 'Live chat was successfully disconnected'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Чат наживо успішно від’єднано' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Live chat was successfully disconnected.' While technically correct, it sounds slightly awkward in Ukrainian. A more common and fluid translation would be something like 'Живий чат успішно відключено' or 'Живий чат успішно вимкнено'. The use of 'від’єднано' sounds more like a physical disconnection rather than a digital one.

The translation '实时聊天已结束' while generally conveying the idea of ending a live chat, doesn't directly translate 'disconnected'. 'Disconnected' implies a deliberate severance of a connection, whereas '结束' implies an ending, which could be due to various reasons (user leaving, timeout, etc.).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 实时聊天已断开连接 (Shi shi lian ting yi duan kai lian jie) - This directly translates to 'Live chat has been disconnected'.
